overview: Three-part short film. Contains: "L'atelier de peinture" Live action combine with manipulation of the film by bleaching or displacing the emulsion side and with collage of acetate or 35mm slides; "Church": Live action manipulated with «ammonia base detergent»; "Subject:Sound Color Picture": Found Footage recut into S-8mm and edited on the academy leader structure.
title: 3 Shorts
